description.p: The HelpFiles directory contains the same subdirectories as the User and TS directories. However, each (except XSL) initially contians onlly a single batch file. This file generates another batch file that actually transforms the XML primary source from the TS and User directories into HTML modules (topics).

It also generates the help project files for each subdirectory. These files can be concatenated together with some intervention to become the master project files found in the HelpFile directory (TestHelp.hh%).
Files in the HelpFiles folder are mostly hand-edited and should not be deleted.
